SEARCH
Package com.project.RabbitRun.entity

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.project.RabbitRun.entity.Entity
com.project.RabbitRun.entity.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Represents the player character in the game, including attributes for position, movement, score, and interactions with objects.

  • Field Summary

      keyHandler - the handler for managing player input

    • isWinningConditionMet

      public boolean isWinningConditionMet()
      Checks if the player has met the winning condition.
      Returns:
      true if the player's points are greater than or equal to the required winning points and the required number of clovers has been collected; false otherwise
